channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former Trump campaign manager registers to advocate for Israel
item.description: Brad Parscale , a top aide on President Trump's first two campaigns, registered as a foreign agent to work on Israel's behalf and create digital media...

item.title: Bullet inscriptions test journalism norms around spreading shooters' messages
item.description: The assailants in several recent mass shootings left behind messages inscribed on bullet casings, posing a dilemma for journalists who want to inform ...

item.title: Trump orders $50M for AI in pediatric cancer research
item.description: President Trump signed an order Tuesday directing his administration to invest $50 million in AI-driven pediatric cancer research. Why it matters: The...

item.title: Travelers and air traffic controllers may face disruptions in a government shutdown
item.description: Air travel is bracing for disruptions as Congress races against tonight's federal funding deadline to avert a shutdown . Why it matters: The U.S. Trav...

item.title: "It's pretty clear we're shutting down": Democrats brace for impact
item.description: House Democrats emerged from a closed-door meeting Tuesday talking more in terms of what to do if the government shuts down than about how to prevent ...

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: Battleground lawmaker’s bid for Arizona governor could affect control of Congress next year
item.description: The decision by David Schweikert creates a vacancy in one of the most competitive House districts in the country.

item.title: Trump, Hegseth lecture military leaders in rare, politically charged summit
item.description: The unusual, hastily organized event became a forum for the president and his defense secretary to tout their partisan agenda.

item.title: Tell The Post: Are you a federal worker who would be affected by a government shutdown?
item.description: We want to hear from federal workers about how a shutdown would affect them professionally and personally. Tell us your story through this form.

item.title: Hegseth wants to return the military to 1990 — a dark time in its history
item.description: The early 1990s saw the U.S. Navy rocked by the Tailhook sexual assault scandal, exposing a dark underside of military culture.

item.title: Trump announces deal with Pfizer to lower drug prices, new ‘TrumpRx’ website
item.description: The White House has been pursuing efforts to lower U.S. drug costs by linking them to the cheaper prices paid abroad.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
